name: Join Me
description:
[UNDER DEVELOPMENT] USE "E" TO CHANGE CHARACTER USE "Q" TO CHANGE WORLD USE "ESC" TO RELOAD LEVEL

#GGJ2021 #GGJSampaDiversa21

A jump-based platform game of three playable characters, lost in a unknown universe. They have to find each other and combine their unique skills to get to the portal that will send them home! Each character has its own platforms only they can see, and they will need to work together to solve the puzzle!

ARTISTS | Ana Vinhas & Débora Tavares

GAME COMPOSER | Leticia Medeiros

GAME DESIGN | Matheus Marcos & Davi Bennier

LEVEL DESIGN | Matheus Marcos & Davi Bennier

PROGRAMMER | Liliane Castro

UI DESIGN | Davi Bennier
